data.title: Cambodia's consumer market to hit US$16 billion in 2025, says EuroCham - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia’s consumer market is projected to hit US$16 billion by 2025, largely driven by rapid urbanisation and a burgeoning middle class coupled with increasing disposable incomes.

data.title: Cambodia: A war-torn country that became China’s firm ally in Southeast Asia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: While most Southeast Asian countries have stressed they will not take sides between China and the US, Cambodia — a steadfast strategic ally of China in Southeast Asia — is the exception.

data.title: Cambodian journalist investigating illegal logging shot - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Veteran reporter Chhoeung Chheung, 63, was shot in the abdomen. Police arrested a suspect, but claims the attack was due to a "personal dispute" rather than the journalist’s ongoing investigations.

data.title: Cambodian genocide survivors still healing from 50 years of trauma - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Nearly half a century after Pol Pot’s Khmer Rouge regime murdered at least 2 million people in Cambodia – a quarter of the country’s population – fresh terror lingers in the bodies, minds, and even the dreams of survivors.

data.title: FDI inflows into Cambodia hit $8.1 bn in a year from Sept 2023 - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: FDI inflows into Cambodia surged to $8.1 billion between September 2024 and the same month last year.

data.title: Ottawa urged to act on import of Cambodian monkeys for labs, as questions linger about whether some could be caught in wild - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Animal-welfare advocates and MPs are urging the Canadian government to prevent endangered monkeys that were imported from Cambodia for use in a laboratory being released from quarantine within days, saying they should be sent to a sanctuary instead.

data.title: Cambodia says Xi supports controversial canal, but China’s silence keeps questions flowing - The Cambodia Daily
